price: 10. Ik zei (tegen hen): “Vraag om vergiffenis van jullie Heer; waarlijk, Hij is de meest vergevende.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
